title: Boxy, Slabby, Serif Typeface -- what is it?
content:
Can someone please help me identify this typeface? I have it in outlines but need to match it. Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [transat.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013112132/http:/typophile.com/files/transat.gif) | 4.57 KB |
author: lorenk

comments.content: [Martin Majoor](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013112132/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Martin%20Majoor)'s classic [FF Scala](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013112132/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FF.11118.1.5&attributes.sampleSize=96&sampleText=Transat&sampleSize=74), one of the original [FontFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013112132/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontFont)s from the 1991 _5 Dutch Designers_ release.
